title: Connecting Metamask wallet on the limit orders page
preconditions: Previously installed Metamask extension in the browser and authorized Metamask account.
postconditions: The shortened wallet number and the number of native tokens are displayed at the header.
steps_actions:
1. "Open the limit orders page."
2. "Click on the \"Connect wallet\" button below the limit order module."
3. "Select Metamask wallet."
4. "Click on the EVM-based button."
5. "Click the Connect button in the Metamask window."
steps_result:
1. "The limit orders page opens.![image.png](https://d2cxucsjd6xvsd.cloudfront.net/public/team/b50ac8e133663944768bd8fc2da17e5374f3a6e3/attachment/8b4828fdb3b7411efc4954039317a337a8f1674a/image.png)"
2. "Side menu with a list of wallets to connect. With the detected Metamask wallet.![image.png](https://d2cxucsjd6xvsd.cloudfront.net/public/team/b50ac8e133663944768bd8fc2da17e5374f3a6e3/attachment/11fd5b7daa913f0047f0c2b4b9cb3b7774677ef3/image.png)"
3. "The side menu “Select networks to connect” appears with two buttons: “EVM-based” and “Solana".
![image.png](https://d2cxucsjd6xvsd.cloudfront.net/public/team/b50ac8e133663944768bd8fc2da17e5374f3a6e3/attachment/b1811f2b84d7f07de78140f972204e9b68660cfc/image.png)"
4. "Open the Metamask window confirmation of connection to the 1inch.io website, with the “Cancel” and “Connect” buttons. 

The window should contain the account number ,“Accounts” and ‘Permissions’ tabs, as well as the “Change Accounts” button.
![image.png](https://d2cxucsjd6xvsd.cloudfront.net/public/team/b50ac8e133663944768bd8fc2da17e5374f3a6e3/attachment/220cfedf5713baaf1e824b1717112fa41f88c59b/image.png)"
5. "The Metamask wallet is connecting.
![image.png](https://d2cxucsjd6xvsd.cloudfront.net/public/team/b50ac8e133663944768bd8fc2da17e5374f3a6e3/attachment/fc040a95565d860f547ad613ab5f53b7657ae735/image.png)
The Metamask window closes.
The shortened public key of the wallet is displayed at the header of the page.
![image.png](https://d2cxucsjd6xvsd.cloudfront.net/public/team/b50ac8e133663944768bd8fc2da17e5374f3a6e3/attachment/002c1206a7510be86bcaf7a2853b138e830e428c/image.png)"

title: Cancel Active limit order
description: Closing a limit order for the WPOL and USDT currency pair on the Polygon network.
preconditions:
Active limit order for the WPOL and USDT currency pair
The Polygon network has been selected.
The limit order page is open.
postconditions: After cancellation, the order disappeared from the list of active orders.
steps_actions:
1. "Click on the red cross to close the order."
2. "Confirm a transaction on a wallet"
3. "Close the \u201cTransaction sent\u201d window"
4. "Tap on \"Orders history\" button"
steps_result:
1. "The transaction confirmation window on a wallet with the date and time of the transaction, the destination currency and its amount, the sending currency and its amount, the wallet name and its abbreviated public key, the contract number, the hash, the network commission, and the nonce. Cancel and confirm buttons.
![image.png](https://d2cxucsjd6xvsd.cloudfront.net/public/team/b50ac8e133663944768bd8fc2da17e5374f3a6e3/attachment/0139edb6990640a36661c15fa9c016394816baca/image.png)"
2. "The “Transaction sent” window with the “View on PolygonScan” and “Close” buttons.
![image.png](https://d2cxucsjd6xvsd.cloudfront.net/public/team/b50ac8e133663944768bd8fc2da17e5374f3a6e3/attachment/9f10c648757452aa0047971be9c1650bdb47d7ff/image.png)"
3. "Displaying the Limit orders page
![image.png](https://d2cxucsjd6xvsd.cloudfront.net/public/team/b50ac8e133663944768bd8fc2da17e5374f3a6e3/attachment/fa54fcf3b4dbb60c43ed5e0f09a51c4cee99af13/image.png)"
4. "The order is displayed in the "Orders history' tab.
Displays "Status", "Created/Expiration", "Order rates", "You pay" and "You recieve"
The initial token amount, destination token amount, and order validity period are displayed correctly.
![image.png](https://d2cxucsjd6xvsd.cloudfront.net/public/team/b50ac8e133663944768bd8fc2da17e5374f3a6e3/attachment/42e26df17eadbd4126f471e55616d16d240d17a2/image.png)"

title: Creating a limit order WPOL & USDT
description: Creating a limit order WPOL & USDT on Polygon network.
preconditions:
1inch wallet connected. Balance: 74 Polygon, 10 WPOL.
The Polygon network has been selected.
postconditions: After signing, the order appeared in the list of active orders. The wallet balance decreased by the required amount.
steps_actions:
1. "Open Page limit orders on Polygon network"
2. "In the WPOL field, enter the value 10."
3. "Click on the \"Review limit order\" button"
4. "Tap on \"Verify order\" button"
5. "Sign limit order in wallet."
6. "Click on the button to close the window for placing an order."
steps_result:
1. "Limit order page on the Polygon network with the WPOL & USDT currency pair, with a connected wallet with a balance of 74 POL. The number of WPOL in the “You pay” field is 1.
![image.png](https://d2cxucsjd6xvsd.cloudfront.net/public/team/b50ac8e133663944768bd8fc2da17e5374f3a6e3/attachment/2c4bbf4ffab7f397528a6e8ba8b17d02a435fab1/image.png)"
2. "The value 10 appeared in the WPOL field.
![image.png](https://d2cxucsjd6xvsd.cloudfront.net/public/team/b50ac8e133663944768bd8fc2da17e5374f3a6e3/attachment/c061821d6beb960c5b511669f16de9f14b795ca9/image.png)"
3. "The limit order verification window appears.
The initial token amount, destination token amount, and order validity period are displayed correctly.
![image.png](https://d2cxucsjd6xvsd.cloudfront.net/public/team/b50ac8e133663944768bd8fc2da17e5374f3a6e3/attachment/a59e31831c040002655211534582641bbf2d1af8/image.png)"
4. "Appear "Please, sign limit order in your wallet" module.
![image.png](https://d2cxucsjd6xvsd.cloudfront.net/public/team/b50ac8e133663944768bd8fc2da17e5374f3a6e3/attachment/2de6c73d33a1373c242cd5f26f9ca66d2f104ed2/image.png)
Sign limit page appear in wallet."
5. "The initial token amount, destination token amount, and order validity period are displayed correctly in wallet.
Appear "Limit order submitted" module and close button.
![image.png](https://d2cxucsjd6xvsd.cloudfront.net/public/team/b50ac8e133663944768bd8fc2da17e5374f3a6e3/attachment/72df707e55c304e05b79331837c236b44114b5fd/image.png)"
6. "The order is displayed in the active orders tab.
Displays "Status", "Created/Expiration", "Order rates", "You pay" and "You recieve"
The initial token amount, destination token amount, and order validity period are displayed correctly.
![image.png](https://d2cxucsjd6xvsd.cloudfront.net/public/team/b50ac8e133663944768bd8fc2da17e5374f3a6e3/attachment/1dc7d96231accbc63d3bf54d9f10e61753c25c53/image.png)"
